# Safety Online llms.txt
This site curates industrial safety equipment, compliance resources, and ecommerce workflows for Indian businesses.
Key URLs:
- Homepage: https://www.safetyonline.in/home
- Product catalogue: https://www.safetyonline.in/products
- Learning hub: https://www.safetyonline.in/blog
- Support & enquiries: https://www.safetyonline.in/contact
